import axios from "axios"; import React, { useEffect, useState } from "react"; import { useParams } from "react-router"; const Content=()=>{ const {id, media}=useParams() const [data,setData]=useState({}) useEffect(()=> {console.log('hace el pedido') axios.get(`/api/movies/single/${media}/${id}`) .then((r)=>setData(r.data)) .catch((err)=>console.log(err))} ,[]) console.log(data) return ( <>
